Reviews.Title: Eligible for Windows 8 upgrade
Reviews.Author: Keppler
Reviews.Content: I bought this notebook to use primarily as a streaming device connected to my TV.  It does this well.  I also have a few games loaded on it and it runs them well with their settings turned down.  I purchased this on Monday of black Friday deal week (2012) for $329 and then used Microsoft's windows upgrade offer (windowsupgradeoffer.com  $15) to install windows 8.  The verdict is still out on windows 8 but for the notebook I feel I got a good value.  I especially like that it has a HDMI port so it is just one cable going to my TV for video and sound.If i needed a second I would definitely buy another at the sale price and possibly at regular price.  I gave it four stars because I would say I like it not love it.  It would have to be faster to love it but that would also cost $500+. Overall I would recommend this notebook for streaming video, light gaming, paper typing, and internet.

Reviews.Title: Good product, excellent for students
Reviews.Author: Eric "Eric L. Vasquez"
Reviews.Content: Excellent for students, good quality in video and fast enough w/ regular MS applications, good responsein internet.  It is not too heavy and it doesn't get too hot in your lap.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: H. Barnes "Hi Tek Redneck"
Reviews.Content: Dell Inspiron i15N-2728BK 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black) Although Microsoft lost a foothold in the world of computers when they faded out XP ,This Dell is a very good laptop . I told myself I would never own windows 7 ,but had no choice .I purchased a lap-desk and a cooling pad also All in all I am happy with my Dell

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hill
Reviews.Content: I don't review things very often, but I have decided to give it a go. Below is a list of things I thought were worth mentioning. Hopefully I will remember to update this over time.It has a very pretty glossy finish. The only negative about this thus far is that it attracts smudges and fingerprints very easily.Set up was really simple and fast. I did not have to uninstall many programs.This is the first laptop I have had with the island style keyboard. It will take some time to get used to. In my opinion, it feels a bit clunky.The optical drive is kind of loud. So far I have only used it to install a few games. I am hoping that it is not quite so loud while playing dvds.Speaking of games, if you like to play The Sims 3, it works wonderfully.The Windows Experience Index is 4.6The webcam could use improvements.The track pad is not jumpy and the zoom is fun to play with. The scrolling is going to take some practice though.With default settings, the speakers kind of suck. (What I did to make it better: start/control panel/hardware and sound/sound/right click on speakers/headphones and choose properties/enhancements/check loudness equalization/apply)Update one:Thankfully the optical drive is not loud while playing dvds. However, something I have noticed is that when you open it while it is laying flat on a surface (the laptop) the disc holder thingy will scrape along the surface.I had an issue after using sleep mode for the first time. After doing so, whenever I put it on hibernate, I would find that hours later it had turned itself on...by itself. I did quickly find a solution though and it has not repeated this since.Update two (a year later):Still a very good laptop. My least favorite thing is still the optical drive. It is just cheap and flimsy. (It does work though) The only new issue that has popped up for me involves the trackpad. It occasionally just slows down for some reason. I usually just press F3 to deactivate it and then again to reactivate and then it begins working correctly again. At this point I have played many games using this laptop and although you may have to adjust the settings, it still runs wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Great price. Great product.
Reviews.Author: Fabien Charles
Reviews.Content: This laptop worked as the perfect replacement when I lost my HP. Just started college so I needed something pretty handy at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Average Quality
Reviews.Author: Hemanth
Reviews.Content: Not upto the standards like few other Dell products.The wireless adaptor is pretty bad and keeps kicking me out of the network very very frequently.Planning to return it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Ubah "Prissy Poodle"
Reviews.Content: Used to think highly of Dell computers till I got this. Have to keep refreshing my internet browser EVERYTIME  because it will not load. It's not my wifi because my internet works just fine on my ipad and other devices plus I have the same problem while using other networks. I have spent hours on the phone with DELL customer service and after all else failed, they restored to factory settings but still no difference. They tried to refer me to their software department to pay $130 because its "not a hardware problem and they are not software experts". Why do I have to pay so much money to fix a problem on a laptop that is still under factory warranty? Just horrible!

Reviews.Title: Not as expected, can I exchange it?
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: I wish it was simple as a Mac pro...this one is asking me to add something to the laptop and is anoying...I am simple user no need extra things, but cannot dissable those Dell offers...Plus, the back of the screen is ugly, ordinary (I guess that's way it was cheap) and could easily get scratches that would make the laptop uglier. Whish I can exchange it...:(

Reviews.Title: slowest computrt I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Kristi
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this laptop from Amazon only to be disapointed. It is the slowest laptop I have ever had. I even called my internet service provider to check to see if there was a problem but all is working well. So, I will be returning this laptop as soon as I can contact Amazon for return info.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price.
Reviews.Author: A. Randall
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my wife as a lightning deal on Cyber Monday and picked it up for 329.99.  For this price point, I really felt like I couldn't do better.  The laptop seems to be pretty solid with good hinges (sounds like a dumb point unless you have had a laptop with crappy hinges).  The only part that seems kind of cheap is the keyboard, but for the price I can't complain too much.It comes with an intel core i3 processor which is what really sold me (I could not find the core i series processors at this price point on any other laptops), as the HD and RAM can be upgraded at a pretty inexpensive price.  My wife was adamant about having windows 8 so I purchased the pro upgrade at a reduced price through MS (after rebate from Dell, the upgrade is free). The upgrade went fairly well, however I had to do a bios upgrade in order to get the laptop screen to work with win 8 (the upgrade would seem to freeze after a certain point on me, but once i hooked it up to an external screen i was able to complete it, then found on the dell website that this is a known issue for this model).I did a clean upgrade to 8 so i  can't speak to the performance out of the box with all the bloatware, but for my wife's purposes (viewing videos, pictures, facebook, youtube, etc.) it runs great and is very quick on win 8.Just a note on the weight.  The 8lbs reported by amazon is the weight including shipping materials.  The actual weight of the laptop is around 5lbs with a 15.7" screen and we are happy with that size/weight.  We have not had a need to really test battery life so I can't speak to that aspect of it.Overall we are very happy with this product and would consider buying it again.

Reviews.Title: Build quality is very poor.Wifi issues and more
Reviews.Author: Udayakiran
Reviews.Content: I got this on thanks giving deal so i went with it.Being a dell fan, i wished for a better build quality but this one is so poor that i am afraid any given bad day, if this falls out of hand, there will be no use of this.The keyboard is such a junk and  i fear it might break when typing. If you get this below 300, then its worth the buy. My suggestion, better look for other inspiron laptops. Not this one.After 10 days of use(12/7/12)  Not sure if i got the defective one but i have returned the laptop back. Appearance of blue screen every day, wifi connection issues made me return it. Now the cost has shoot up to 529 which absolutely the laptop does not worth. Please do not buy this laptop for 529. You get v good laptops with i5 in ASUS and HP for below $500. But yes, as long as Amazon is there, you need not fear buying it. If the product isnt good, you can always return it and get the money back.

Reviews.Title: Great unless you want functional RAM.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Daugherty
Reviews.Content: Had to disable a lot of bloatware to get the thing in decent, usable condition. Unfortunately, the RAM became unstable, causing random crashes.Has a cheap, insubstantial enclosure--feels like picking up a child's toy and rattles disturbingly. If it makes you feel better, I'm sure some Dell exec got a bonus for driving down the cost of the materials. Good job--you've lost a customer for life.

Reviews.Title: Runs well, great for price
Reviews.Author: Siegfried Meier
Reviews.Content: I really like this computer as it runs smoothly and is good as an all round use computer. Most Video games will do well on it, but its still only a laptop and won't handle things such as Crysis 2. Over all I'm satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: just okay
Reviews.Author: Shelia K Davis
Reviews.Content: the one we received has issues with staying connected to the WiFi. drops a lot and then your work is compromised..

Reviews.Title: Too slow ...and locks out sometimes...
Reviews.Author: ALAN "Master"
Reviews.Content: Not a very good computer... Gave to my daughter,,she can play with it...for Skype talk with friends and light work online ...it pass.

Reviews.Title: motherboard bad in 6 months
Reviews.Author: 3 dogs 3 cats 3 people "LUV2TRVL"
Reviews.Content: Slow from day one. Used for short periods each day for homework. Motherboard beyond financially reasonable repair after having this computer only 6 months. This is my first and last DELL. Lesson learned. One star for the fact that the product was actually received but that is it....wishing I had never bought it in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop at a good price. It is obviously an entry level pc if you check the specs but thats all i need.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ana Letícia Simal
Reviews.Content: I really love Dell products. It is light to carry everywhere but the material around the keyboard gets dirt easily. The top of the laptop get easily dirt as well. The keyboard is very noisy when typing.

Reviews.Title: Slow & broken
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these "like new" from the Amazon Warehouse deal.  That was a mistake.  Two of the USB ports were broken.  As for the computer; I find that the touchpad is overly sensitive and needed to be disabled when I typed; it takes a long time to boot up; and it's quite slow in terms of processing multiple tasks at once. I'd recommend staying away from this one.

Reviews.Title: A nightmare so far
Reviews.Author: mischasmuse
Reviews.Content: I ordered this back in November as part of their Black Friday deal from Amazon. I then went about setting it up and personalizing and used briefly before putting aside to due traveling. When I got back I went to start the computer and it asked for my password. I could not recall adding a password, and if I had done so, surely it was something easy right? Well, I put in everything I could think to no avail.So since I had yet to register the computer I went ahead and did so and while on the phone with tech support (I was able to get one free tech support call), I asked about accessing my computer without a passwrod. Well, I was informed by Dell that I had to have a Dell USB flash drive to do a system recovery (just for a password??) They overnighted one and then called two days later (I missed that call). They called back this morning and walked me through the process of a recovery. But during the call the computer indicated it could not do a recovery because there was an error. The tech support guy said it was the hard drive (this is a new computer remember) and they will send me out a box with a paid for mailing label - I was to mail the laptop back, they will fix it and send it back. WTF??Seriously there had to have been a better way. I really don't think the computer is bad, but I guess you get what you pay for and I paid only 350. Goes to show you. I would recommend going on Dell's site instead and read all reviews and find a better computer. But then come to think of it, I did that years ago and that Dell laptop tanked after a few years too (and could not be recovered at all). Maybe don't buy a Dell. Buy a MAC instead.

Reviews.Title: EXELENTE LAPTOP DELL
Reviews.Author: JOSE LUIS LUGO MELENDEZ
Reviews.Content: EXELENTE LAPTOP CUMPLE CON LOS PARAMETROS QUE NECESITABA, Y TAMBIEN EXELENTE EL PRESIO AL CUAL LA COMPRE NO ME QUEJO

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in Dell
Reviews.Author: Edward W. Gannaway
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this review by stating that Amazon's service was impeccable and this review is by no means a reflection on them.  Now, on to the laptop.I bought this during the black friday sale as a present for my daughter.  Consequently, it wasn't put into use until Christmas day.  From the first full system startup, the wifi randomly dropped connection to the router.  We have 5 other computers in the house and this laptop was the only one with the issue. Additionally, it would "blue screen" when operating on battery power.  After a bit of searching online, a number of people with similar problems suggested the power management needed tweaking.  None of the proposed measures fixed the problem.  Thinking a complete system reload might help, I proceeded down that path...this didn't help either.  Two usb ports then decided to join the fray and quit working.  Thankfully all of these problems surfaced during the return period and Amazon issued a refund.  Hopefully this system was just a fluke as I am usually pleased with Dell's products.

Reviews.Title: very dissapointed
Reviews.Author: kathryn
Reviews.Content: I am having nothing but problems with this lap top.  Dell has charged me to fix "software" problems.  They did not install all the drivers prior to shipping to me and it has caused major problems.  Not sure how to resolve.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Luis Baluche
Reviews.Content: hello, good morning this product is very good, recomendhello, good morning this product is very good, recomendhello, good morning this product is very good, recomend

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: jesus alexander martinez perez
Reviews.Content: Estoy satisfecho con esta pc, excelente video, rápida , disco duro amplio buena memoria RAM la recomienda  adquiere la x

Reviews.Title: Excelente calidad
Reviews.Author: Jesus Alexander Martinez Perez
Reviews.Content: Excelente calidad , muy rápida ,  video, disco duro amplio,  muy buena memoria RAM  y aplica ciones,  la recomi endo

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: bill h
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these computers for our grown daughters and their families.  One daughter is in the process of moving and I have no report from her, but the other loves the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap laptop
Reviews.Author: Raymond Abreo
Reviews.Content: Dell, Windows 7 laptop works great and very affordable. Recommend for any standard computer user. Best inexpensive laptop I have everpurchased.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Noelle Fullerton
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my son for Christmas.  It was delivered in a timely fashion and had to be signed for.  He is happy with his Christmas present and uses it daily both for school and personal enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Gary T
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a basic laptop this one foots the bill. I mean that in a good way to be clear. Productivity wise and price wise it is a good computer and does all I need it to.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: wen
Reviews.Content: excelente el producto!!!! Muy responsable y super puntual con el envio del producto comprado!!! Me encanto mucho mucho mucho mucho

Reviews.Title: Great Value Laptop
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased the laptop for my 12 year old on Black Friday.  What a value!  She loves it.  We've had no problems.  She has stored all of her music on it, she plays internet games with her friends on it, and syncs the computer with her phone.  Wish I had bought 2.

Reviews.Title: blue screen several times!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: blue screen several times since I started to use it. It is a brand new laptop!I can't believe it it's quality is so poor.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop especially for the price
Reviews.Author: DH
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law for Christmas. She wanted a 15inch screen and I wanted to get her a processor of good quality.  I got this on Amazon's Lightning Deals for a great price!  It gives my mother in law the ability to run multiple programs without freezing and gives her the ability to Skype with all of her grandchildren. The front facing camera displays in good quality. Battery life is decent too.

Reviews.Title: Excelentes, responsables.
Reviews.Author: Jean Carlos
Reviews.Content: Recomiendo a este vendedor, el equipo llego en un perfecto estado a Venezuela. Muy responsables. Empacado con mucho cuidado. Gracias.

Reviews.Title: I purchased the Dell Inspiron for my son for Christmas.. he loves it..
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: Not much to tell at this point.. No problems whatsoever.. my son loves it.. We have never owned a Dell.. but we are hoping that it lasts longer than the 1200 dollar Toshibas that we purchased 3 of back to back and they all crashed at 2 yrs.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Chuxs
Reviews.Content: I like what I see and how it is working! Let's see if it can last thru the next year!

Reviews.Title: A reliable machine :)
Reviews.Author: JJC222
Reviews.Content: I've had a Dell Inspiron before, and it gave me few problems! I only got a new one because someone stepped on the old. Definitely recommend this PC if someone is doing the basics: Word Processing, Internet browsing, Skyping, and so on.

Reviews.Title: Cheap toylike material
Reviews.Author: shannon van der kooy
Reviews.Content: My husband was very surprised by the cheap quality of the computer. We actually ended up sending it back bc we felt as if it wouldn't even last me through nursing school. The quality is very disappointing for a dell :(

Reviews.Title: This computer works as expected
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey G. Merrill
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer as a replacement for my daughter's which stopped working.  It is meeting all her expectations and helping her complete her important actiivties.

Reviews.Title: YOU GET WHAT U SEE
Reviews.Author: JeremyR
Reviews.Content: its a nice laptop its  for my mother in law was perfect  she love it~!Design its nicesoftware its cool its fast!!size she love it but I prefer more than 17 inchso you get what u see in the seller description.

Reviews.Title: Problems from the beginning
Reviews.Author: happy customer
Reviews.Content: I don't know why we are having these issues or if I  will send it back, but the computer has super slow internet speed (and I have another laptop that will be flying on the same internet connection at the same time) even if I shut everything else off (the other computer, kids' ipods, etc) a lot of the time.  It has crashed a handful of times on its own either when 'asleep' or once when we were using it, all in the first couple of weeks of owning it.  I can't get it to connect to my wireless printer at all, despite downloading software.  I got it for work and I work on my old one because I can't count on the internet connection and can't print.  Pretty frustrated so far.

Reviews.Title: decent laptop
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: I got this for a friend who only needs to browse, watch movies, view google earth and shop online. Its basic and the performance is decent. I have use teamviewer to login to the machine and see its performance and it responds well for the use that i had in mind.

Reviews.Title: Would have kept if it weren't for the wi-fi connection issue
Reviews.Author: Johnnie B
Reviews.Content: I am experincing the same wi-fi connection issue that Udayakiran posted, however, I'm not seeing the blue screen problem.  If it weren't for the connection issue, this laptap would serve well for everyday home use for the gold box deal I got it for.It's not the most portable of 15" laptop.  As you can see from the picture that it is a bit on the thick side but those seeking an ultrabook would not be looking at this laptop.  Some may say that the build quality is poor but it seems rigid enough.  The black plastic body and the understated design may seem cheap or boring to some.  Definitely doesn't have the sleekness or the rigid feel of aluminum unibody.  There's no mistaking that this laptop is all about function over style.The display is fine, the touchpad response is good and the hardware specs are well beyond the price I paid.  The real design drawback to this laptop (connection issue I consider an isolated flaw) is the feel of the keyboard.  The looseness and rattling of the keys every time you type screams cheap.  Other budget laptops I owned had much better keyboards.  I don't think the keys will crumble or fall out but every key stroke is a reminder that it's a budget laptop.

Reviews.Title: It's a Dell. They are the best PC's
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Seelman
Reviews.Content: Just got this unit. So far working perfectly, but not surprising considering it is a Dell. I reccomend this item.

Reviews.Title: Good for Personal as well as Professional Use
Reviews.Author: Zahid Zubair
Reviews.Content: I own an older version of Dell Inspiron and it is running perfect since 5years. This inspired me to buy a newer model of Inspiron. The "good" about Dell products is the sound quality. Yes, Dell has a great sound quality and the amplitude that this laptop can expose is high when compared to a similar product from any other brand. My earlier laptop does not have an HDMI port, but this newer one "does". This made me really excited as I can use it on any HDMI capable device, like a 3D TV. The processing speed of this laptop is good for professional as well as for personal use. I like the CAPS lock key that lights up an in-built LED (built with-in the caps lock key) to notify CAPS lock is enabled.As I have very good trust in Dell products, and also with my personal experience of exhaustive usage, I highly recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Mousepad is a bit off
Reviews.Author: Ananth Agastya
Reviews.Content: The mousepad is a bit off (doesn't "gel" nicely like the other laptops from Dell do). Otherwise, this is a great product for the price (I got it on TG for 399+tax). The 4 stars is for the mouse, otherwise, I'd give it 5 stars. I like the fact it has an HDMI input, among other things.

Reviews.Title: Dell has gone WAY downhill
Reviews.Author: OhioT
Reviews.Content: You know when you look at a model home and they have fake plastic TVs and other electronics just for show?  This computer feels cheaper than those.  When you click the keys on the left side of the keyboard, the whole thing rattles like something is broken.  Except this is how it was made.  Ours has connectivity issues beyond that, so it's going back.Amazon has great customer service, the only saving grace for this P O S.  Do yourself a favor and spend a few more bucks on something other than a Dell.  They are not making them the way they use to.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron i15N-2548BK 15-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Alexander K. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I like my Dell Inspiron i15N-2548BK 15-Inch Laptop because it is a very powerful computer for the price. I especially like it because it is very light and easily portable.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15-inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: gail bixby
Reviews.Content: Great deal!  We have this model laptop in our home.  This one is for my sister-in-law.  Now we can share photos.  Arrived ahead of scedule.  Would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Basic Laptop for a Basic User
Reviews.Author: ForWife
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop for my wife as an early Christmas gift (got it for $329 on Cyber Monday). She plans to use it for typical tasks, such as email and browsing the internet. She is happy with the laptop, it is bigger than the tiny computers available at the a comparable price and faster. My only complaint is the laptop feels cheap - I can't stand it, but it's her computer and she likes it.

Reviews.Title: Better deal at DELL
Reviews.Author: J. Mak
Reviews.Content: I am not a computer expert, but you can buy a computer from DELL for $429 and it comes with Windows 8 and weighs only 5.2 lbs versus the one on Amazon with Windows 7 Home Edition and weighs 8.1 lbs.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-2370M 2.4GHz
4 GB DIMM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron i15N-2548BK 15-Inch Laptop (Black)
